text: Fatandira's Scythan tribe has settled in Quatar to serve their master, Tutankhanut. But she is torn between the traditions of her people and the worship of their new god...
The Sultan of the Seas has sailed to the Copper Landing on the coast of Lustria, seeking to plunder the wealth and riches of this primeval land and to conquer the Galleon's Graveyard.
Sultan Jaffar gathers his armies in Al Haikk to take revenge on his enemies and establish Arabyan dominance in the Old World.

A recent newcomer to the Border Princes, Fatandira and her tribe of itinerant Arabyans have established themselves in Blood River Pass, their budding colony already drawing the attention of nearby perils.

From his corsair fortress of El-Khabbath, the Golden Magus sails towards the Old World in his quest for terrenal wealth and magical power... with his greedy gaze ever fixed upon the Galleon's Graveyard.
Sultan Jaffar gathers his armies in Al Haikk to take revenge on his enemies and establish Arabyan dominance in the Old World.
